text: "We Are Young" is a song by the American band Fun. It is from their album Some Nights. It was released as the first single from the album on 20 September 2011. The song was covered on Glee on the episode "Hold On to Sixteen", aired in December 2011. It won the Grammy Award for Song of the Year at the 2013 Grammy Awards. Category:2011 songs Category:Grammy Award-winning songs
title: We Are Young
